Package bricker.brick_strategies

Class ExtraLifeStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • bricker.brick_strategies.BasicCollisionStrategy
      • bricker.brick_strategies.ExtraLifeStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionStrategy
    public class ExtraLifeStrategy
extends BasicCollisionStrategy
    Strategy for granting an extra life upon collision.

    This class extends BasicCollisionStrategy and is responsible for creating a Heart object, which increases the player's life count, when a collision occurs.

    Version:
    Java 11
    Author:
    Noam Shabat, Samuel Hayat

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExtraLifeStrategy

        public ExtraLifeStrategy​(danogl.collisions.GameObjectCollection gameObjects,
                         danogl.gui.rendering.Renderable renderable,
                         danogl.util.Counter lifeCounter)
        Constructs an ExtraLifeStrategy instance with the necessary components to create and manage heart objects.
        Parameters:
        gameObjects - The game object of the game.
        renderable - The visual representation for the heart object.
        lifeCounter - A counter tracking the player's lives.

    • Method Detail

      • getTag

        public java.lang.String getTag()
        Returns a unique tag identifying this specific strategy. This tag can be used for debugging or identifying the strategy during the game.
        Specified by:
        getTag in interface CollisionStrategy
        Overrides:
        getTag in class BasicCollisionStrategy
        Returns:
        A string representing the tag of this collision strategy.

      • onCollision

        public void onCollision​(danogl.GameObject thisObj,
                        danogl.GameObject otherObj,
                        danogl.util.Counter bricksCounter,
                        boolean originalBehavior)
        Handles the collision event and creates a heart object to grant an extra life. This method is invoked when a collision occurs with an object implementing this strategy. It creates a heart object that, when collected, increases the player's life count.
        Specified by:
        onCollision in interface CollisionStrategy
        Overrides:
        onCollision in class BasicCollisionStrategy
        Parameters:
        thisObj - The GameObject that this strategy is attached to.
        otherObj - The GameObject that has collided with thisObj.
        bricksCounter - A counter tracking the number of bricks in the game.
        originalBehavior - A boolean flag indicating whether the original behavior of the collision should also occur.
